001package io.jstach.rainbowgum;
002
003import java.net.URI;
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.Map;
006import java.util.Objects;
007import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
008import java.util.function.Supplier;
009
010import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
011
012/**
013 * A simple service locator for initialization purposes and external services provided by
014 * plugins.
015 */
016public sealed interface ServiceRegistry permits DefaultServiceRegistry {
017
018        /**
019         * Creates an empty service registry.
020         * @return registry.
021         */
022        public static ServiceRegistry of() {
023                return new DefaultServiceRegistry();
024        }
025
026        /**
027         * Puts a service.
028         * @param <T> service type.
029         * @param type type.
030         * @param service service instance.
031         * @param name name of service.
032         */
033        public <T> void put(Class<T> type, T service, String name);
034
035        /**
036         * Puts a service.
037         * @param <T> service type.
038         * @param type type.
039         * @param supplier service instance.
040         * @return service.
041         */
042        public <T> T putIfAbsent(Class<T> type, Supplier<T> supplier);
043
044        /**
045         * Puts a service with name "".
046         * @param <T> service type.
047         * @param type type.
048         * @param service service instance.
049         */
050        default <T> void put(Class<T> type, T service) {
051                put(type, service, "");
052        }
053
054        /**
055         * Finds a service or null.
056         * @param <T> service type
057         * @param type service class.
058         * @param name name of service.
059         * @return service or <code>null</code>.
060         */
061        @SuppressWarnings("exports")
062        public <T> @Nullable T findOrNull(Class<T> type, String name);
063
064        /**
065         * Finds a service or null.
066         * @param <T> service type.
067         * @param type service class.
068         * @return service or <code>null</code>.
069         */
070        @SuppressWarnings("exports")
071        default <T> @Nullable T findOrNull(Class<T> type) {
072                return findOrNull(type, "");
073        }
074
075        /**
076         * Finds <strong>all</strong> services of a specific type.
077         * @param <T> service type.
078         * @param type service class.
079         * @return list of services.
080         */
081        public <T> List<T> find(Class<T> type);
082
083}
084
085record ServiceKey(Class<?> type, String name) {
086        ServiceKey {
087                Objects.requireNonNull(type);
088                Objects.requireNonNull(name);
089        }
090}
091
092interface PluginProvider<T, E extends Exception> {
093
094        public T provide(URI uri, String name, LogProperties properties) throws E;
095
096}
097
098abstract class ProviderRegistry<T extends PluginProvider<U, E>, U, E extends Exception> {
099
100        protected final Map<String, T> providers = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
101
102        public void register(String scheme, T provider) {
103                providers.put(scheme, provider);
104        }
105
106}
107
108final class DefaultServiceRegistry implements ServiceRegistry {
109
110        private final Map<ServiceKey, Object> services = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
111
112        @Override
113        public <T> void put(Class<T> type, T service, String name) {
114                if (service == null) {
115                        throw new NullPointerException("service");
116                }
117                services.getOrDefault(new ServiceKey(type, name), service);
118
119        }
120
121        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
122        @Override
123        public <T> @Nullable T findOrNull(Class<T> type, String name) {
124                Objects.requireNonNull(type, "type");
125                Objects.requireNonNull(name, "name");
126                return (T) services.get(new ServiceKey(type, name));
127        }
128
129        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
130        @Override
131        public <T> List<T> find(Class<T> type) {
132                return services.entrySet().stream().filter(e -> e.getKey().type() == type).map(e -> (T) e.getValue()).toList();
133        }
134
135        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
136        @Override
137        public <T> T putIfAbsent(Class<T> type, Supplier<T> supplier) {
138                var t = (T) services.computeIfAbsent(new ServiceKey(type, ""), k -> Objects.requireNonNull(supplier.get()));
139                return t;
140        }
141
142}
